ps2.1:6.2: hoti so → so (bj, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed) | ajjhattameva → ajjhattaññeva (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ps2.1:45.1: cittassa saṅkhepavikkhepaviggahitaṃ → cittassa saṅkhepaṃ vikkhepaṃ viggahitaṃ (sya-all); cittasaṅkhepavikkhepaṃ avikkhepaṃ viggahitaṃ (pts-vp-pli1) | dasa ṭhāne sampajānātīti → dasaṭṭhāne (mānasaṃ kusalā) sampajānātīti (bj); dasaṭṭhānehi sampajānātīti (sya-all); dasaṭṭhānehi pajānātīti (pts-vp-pli1)
